reviewText: bought to send to friends in Europe
Only one of the DVDs was worth watching... in my own opinion.  I would certainly NOT call this the best train video at all...
This is the best train video set ever produced.  Very excellent scenery with music and narration.  Anyone who loves train or scenery will love these videos.

This is a very good collection of railroad videos. They show a couple of tourist lines, and several long distance rides. They also show railroading in different seasons. All in all, a very nice collection.

Lots of good railroad rides and scenery. Now I can sit in my easy chair and ride all over the country without having to leave my home! It drives my wife crazy but I sure have a great time without spending anything on gas or food. I can stop in any town on the route! I'm looking for more just like it!!!
Interesting collection of mostly 90's film footage.
My 86 year old Dad loves them.
I have only viewed a few of the dvds.  So far I have liked what  i have seen.  They don't overpower the scenery with excessive narration.
The  only problem with it is that I now have the exact same railway journeys, with word for word narration,  packaged in three supposedly different sets.  Let potential buyers take note.
love the movies so I think you should buy it
great train video.  probably my best in my collection.  it is an older video but is a good one
Like it.  Extensive.  Some of the clips are quite old.
As a lover of trains, this was a perfect video set for me.  I was not disappointed - it is a great set.
